page.title: 18LOCAL SUPERNATURAL TALES
page.content: {THE GHOST OF ACLE BRIDGE} OLD ACLE BRIDGE WAS PULLED DOWN SOME YEARS AGO,AND REPLACED BY A NEW CONCRETE STRUCTURE.THIS IS A PITY, BECAUSE THE BRICKWORK OF THE OLD BRIDGE BORE A DARK RED STAIN,REPUTEDLY LEFT THERE WHEN A BRUTAL MURDER TOOK PLACE TWO HUNDRED YEARS AGO.ATTEMPTS TO SCRUB AWAY THE BLOODSTAIN WERE DOOMED TO FAILURE-BY MORNING THE RED MARK HAD ALWAYS RETURNED.THE MURDER IS WELL-DOCUMENTED,AND MANY PEOPLE CLAIM TO HAVE SEEN IT RE-ENACTED ON APRIL 7TH AT MIDNIGHT-THE ANNIVERSARY OF THE FOUL DEED. MORE RECENTLY,CAR DRIVERS HAVE REPORTED SEEING A HIDEOUS GLOWING SKELETON LOLLING CARELESSLY AGAINST THE PARAPET OF THE BRIDGE.
